Toll Free Phone: 1.800.739.7367- Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 9:00pm to talk with a nurse- Call Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:30pm to book appointment
Service Details: - Provides confidential, nonjudgmental, youth-friendly, pro-choice, and sex-positive sexual and reproductive health services for all genders, all orientations and all ages- Services include low-cost contraception, STI care, Pap screening, pregnancy testing and pregnancy options counselling (please note:  services provided in each of our clinics are clinician dependent and may vary from clinic to clinic)- To make appointments, please call 1.800.739.7367, Mon-Fri: 9:00am - 4:30pm
Cost: No fees for Clients with valid MSP coverage (this does not include contraceptive products) * please note that the clinic is cash only
